summary: When a police officer wakes up in a hospital to find out he is in the middle of a zombie apocalypse, he will do anything to find his family, even sacrifice Twitter.
cast: Tim Ogletree|Joey Oglesby|Troy Ogletree|Dave Sheridan|Sophia Ali|Danielle Garcia|Mason Dakota Galyon|Andrew Pozza|Jacqui Holland|Richard Lukens|Martha Prentiss|Trenton Rostedt|Michael Jastroch|Wray Crawford|Cassandra Lazenby|Bennett LeBarre|Clint Hansen|Brett Houston|Tyler Jade Nixon|Dureen Siebersma|Jennifer Huff|Ashley Turner|Deauxma|Wyoming Wynters|Conley Wehner|Philip Marlatt|Ken Tayloe|Ernie Davis|Janett Janysek|Francis Casanova|Paxon Taylor|Russell Rush|Tiffany Braden|Erica Buitron|Maxillian Grimm|Jesse Hu Jenkinson|Natalie Makenna|Larry J. Pulliam|Billionna Olivia Reyes|Claire Tablizo|Jack Tablizo|Rose Tablizo|John Wirt|Jo King
title: Walking with the Dead
